file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-03-02 - MAIN-LANDING-GEAR MAIN BRACE STRUT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-LANDING-GEAR MAIN BRACE STRUT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the Main-Landing-Gear (MLG) main brace strut. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MLG MAIN BRACE STRUT - RESTORA- ALL 32-10-03-900-801-A ♦ TION MLG LOWER MAIN SIDE STRUT ASSY - ALL 32-10-03-900-802-A RESTORATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-03-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG MAIN BRACE STRUT - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the last revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1190 to restore the MLG main brace strut. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION MAIN BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR AMM TASK 32-10-03-000-801-A/400 - REMOVAL MAIN BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR AMM TASK 32-10-03-400-801-A/400 - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the MLG main brace strut (AMM TASK 32-10-03-000-801-A/400). J. Restore MLG Brace Strut (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1190 to restore the MLG main brace strut. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the MLG main brace strut (AMM TASK 32-10-03-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL MLG Main Brace Strut - Restoration Figure 201 A ZONES 721 731 UPPER MAIN BRACE STRUT MAIN BRACE STRUT ASSY LOWER MAIN BRACE STRUT DET. A 145AMM320062.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-03 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-03-900-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MLG LOWER MAIN SIDE STRUT ASSY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the last revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1190 to restore the MLG Lower Main Side Strut Assy. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION MAIN BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR AMM TASK 32-10-03-000-801-A/400 - REMOVAL MAIN BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR AMM TASK 32-10-03-400-801-A/400 - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) Remove the MLG main side strut (AMM TASK 32-10-03-000-801-A/400). J. Restore MLG Lower Main Side Strut Assy SUBTASK 900-004-A (1) Refer to the last revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1190 to restore the MLG main brace strut. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Install the MLG main brace strut (AMM TASK 32-10-03-400-801-A/400).
